TopicTitle: How to launch a pod directly vertical using RCS?

Articles.Content: Current situation, landed a craft on the Mun, have the housing module on top of a rover, which is on top of the landing craft. The rover has RCS and fuel, any way of launching straight vertical to get off of the landing pod? Thanks
with your RCS thrusters turned on, the keys I J K and L all controll direction just like WASD. H and N will move it vertically. Hope I could help
H button fires the RCS to propel the craft relatively "forwards", IIRC.
